t: Amazon targets offline retail in India | WARC
s: Future Retail currently operates several brands with an enormous footprint: over 1000 stores in 250 cities with an annual customer base of 500 million across India. It is not the first physical investment that Amazon has made in India’s physical retail space. In September 2017, amazon bought a 5% stake in Shoppers Stop, as well as a stake in Aditya Birla group’s More supermarket chain. Livemint writes that the Future Retail deal will give Amazon a head start in the offline ...
